mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (name, nickname, login_id, password, phone, email, identity) VALUES (#{name}, #{nickname}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{identity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY member_id DESC LIMIT 1
select member_id, name, nickname, login_id, password, phone, email, account_bank, account, identity, member_intro, member_date, withdrawl from member where member_id = #{memberId}
